name: For Tomorrow
description:
X is struggling with mental illnesses. It has taken over their life and mind, now stronger than ever, and it won't stop until X gives in.

The Darkness is now at its peak. X must travel through the many level of their subconscious mind and defeat the Darkness, overcome the tight grip that their illnesses has on them. Before the Darkness consumes them forever.

▪▪▪

Play as X and journey through the now crumbling realm of the mind. Defeat enemies and find a way through the darkness in this minimalist, rouge-lite game.

"For Tomorrow" is in its prototype stage.
